mapper.select: SELECT t1.id , t1.sku_sn, concat(t2.name,' ',t1.name) skuName, t1.img_url, t1.price, t1.stock, t2.name as spuName FROM pms_sku t1 INNER JOIN pms_spu t2 ON t1.spu_id = t2.id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
